events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position. Our team will review your details carefully.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering as a software developer role, suitable for screening.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your profile and will contact you soon for the next steps.
We have completed the initial screening, and you meet the basic requirements for the software engineer role.
Thank you for your reply; we appreciate your promptness and enthusiasm to proceed with the technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-05 at 10:00 AM UTC with our lead developer.
The technical interview is complete; you demonstrated strong problem-solving skills and sound coding practices.
An HR interview has been arranged for 2024-05-08 at 09:00 AM UTC to discuss cultural fit and benefits.
You completed the HR interview successfully and expressed clear alignment with our company values and mission.
We are excited to propose an offer for the software engineer position, including competitive salary and benefits.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed eagerness to join the engineering team.
Your acceptance of the offer has been confirmed, and we are pleased to welcome you aboard as a software engineer.
Onboarding activities have commenced; please complete all necessary documentation and join the introductory sessions.
The hiring process is officially closed. We look forward to your contributions as a key member of our engineering team.
